医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究开发革命性的工具包来对抗数字排斥研究人员创建了数字排除的综合指标和相关工具箱。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Research-develop-a-revolutionary-toolkit-to-combat-digital-exclusion.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Research-develop-a-revolutionary-toolkit-to-combat-digital-exclusion.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b5a425b1-b7ec-48e2-ab1d-b2043e7a4752 Mon, 07 Aug 2023 05:09:00 -0400 Research develop a revolutionary toolkit to combat digital exclusion
了解免疫缺陷状态下 SARS-CoV-2 进化和清除的变化研究人员描述了免疫抑制个体中持续感染 SARS-CoV-2 的病毒学范围。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Understanding-variations-in-SARS-CoV-2-evolution-and-clearance-by-immunodefiency-status.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Understanding-variations-in-SARS-CoV-2-evolution-and-clearance-by-immunodeficiency-status.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f9f176b-4de8-41cd-b3f0-0c2f96fcc7b0 Mon, 07 Aug 2023 05:02:00 -0400 Understanding variations in SARS-CoV-2 evolution and clearance by immunodeficiency status
M2巨噬细胞衍生的外泌体在控制脓毒症中性粒细胞介导的组织损伤中的作用研究人员调查 M2 巨噬细胞衍生的外泌体是否可以预防脓毒症期间炎症相关的损伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Role-of-M2-macrophage-衍生-exosomes-in-controlling-neutropil-media-tissue-injury-in-sepsis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Role-of-M2-macrophage-衍生-exosomes-in-controlling-neutropil-media-tissue-injury-in-sepsis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7190df63-8efe-45cf-a079-88084ceedb4a Mon, 07 Aug 2023 04:53:00 -0400 Role of M2 macrophage-derived exosomes in controlling neutrophil-mediated tissue injury in sepsis
探索 COVID-19 mRNA 疫苗对老年人的安全性研究人员评估了老年人接种 COVID-19 mRNA 疫苗后可能出现的不良事件的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Exploring-the-safety-of-COVID-19-mRNA-vaccines-in-the-elderly.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Exploring-the-safety-of-COVID-19-mRNA-vaccines-in-the-elderly.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5d9b57b-3b96-4096-a84c-1abdcb1d9f6d Mon, 07 Aug 2023 04:47:00 -0400 Exploring the safety of COVID-19 mRNA vaccines in the elderly
HIV 感染者对 COVID-19 感染和疫苗接种反应良好研究人员检查了 HIV 感染者对自然感染或 COVID-19 疫苗接种的抗体反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/People-living-with-HIV-respond-well-to-COVID-19-infection-and-vaccination.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/People-living-with-HIV-respond-well-to-COVID-19-infection-and-vaccination.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7956e114-9a62-46f4-983b-d6e8850a43d1 Mon, 07 Aug 2023 04:34:00 -0400 People living with HIV respond well to COVID-19 infection and vaccination
间充质干细胞疗法治疗重症 COVID-19 的安全性常氧同种异体脐带间充质干细胞对于治疗重症 COVID-19 患者是安全有效的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/The-safety-of-mesenchymal-stem-cell-therapy-for-treating-severe-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/The-safety-of-mesenchymal-stem-cell-therapy-for-treating-severe-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a5249eb2-9248-4d81-89d8-47f928fb1aa5 Mon, 07 Aug 2023 04:15:00 -0400 The safety of mesenchymal stem cell therapy for treating severe COVID-19
死后人类大脑和活人大脑之间基因表达的相似性研究人员比较了活体和死后样本之间的人类前额皮质基因表达。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Similarities-in-gene-express- Between-post-mortem-and-living- human-brains.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Similarities-in-gene-expression- Between-post-mortem-and-living- human-brains.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5257201f-f92d-4ddb-b148-a6006383cc61 Mon, 07 Aug 2023 03:23:00 -0400 Similarities in gene expression between post-mortem and living human brains
循环蛋白质组如何影响大脑健康？研究人员调查了循环蛋白质组与大脑健康之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/How-does-the-circulate-proteome-influence-brain-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/How-does-the-circulate-proteome-influence-brain-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c26deb5-926e-40e5-bb05-b6d41e57bc11 Mon, 07 Aug 2023 03:18:00 -0400 How does the circulating proteome influence brain health?
研究发现三分之一的英国人羞于谈论消化系统健康症状新研究表明，三分之一的英国人 (33%) 不好意思谈论他们的消化系统健康症状，近三分之二 (64%) 的人希望获得更多支持来帮助了解他们的肠道健康状况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/1-in-3-Brits-embarrassed-to-talk-about-digestive-health-symptoms-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/1-in-3-Brits-embarrassed-to-talk-about-digestive-health-symptoms-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7cae5ce0-553a-4951-88bf-8c97e8b23606 Mon, 07 Aug 2023 02:50:00 -0400 1 in 3 Brits embarrassed to talk about digestive health symptoms, study finds
新冠病例和入院人数激增，主要检测专家警告称病例会卷土重来一位领先的检测专家担心，随着病例和入院人数激增，英国正面临新冠疫情卷土重来的情况。他说政府必须恢复三月份取消的抗体检测计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Covid-cases-and-hospital-admissions-soar-leading-testing-expert-warns-of-resurgence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Covid-cases-and-hospital-admissions-soar-leading-testing-expert-warns-of-resurgence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1e4957a-cfa7-4c62-b9ac-fd3ba502545d Mon, 07 Aug 2023 02:40:00 -0400 Covid cases and hospital admissions soar, leading testing expert warns of resurgence
